testcase.name: A CategoryEndpoint must return all the categories when there is at least one
A CategoryEndpoint must return BadRequest with repeated titles
A CategoryEndpoint must create a category
A CategoryEndpoint must return NotFound when we try to delete a non existent category

failure.message: 500 Internal Server Error was not equal to 404 Not Found

testcase.name: A CategoryEndpoint must return NoContent when we delete an existent category

failure.message: ERROR: relation "categories" does not exist Position: 13
